rules_text:
Trample
Whenever this creature enters or transforms into Valseid, Leyran Brute, it deals 2 damage to any target that isn’t a blocking creature and you gain 2 life.
{3}{R}{G}: Transform Valseid, Leyran Brute. Activate only if it’s attacking.
rules_text2:
Trample
Whenever this creature transforms into Valseid, Leyran Ravager or you cast a Wolf or Werewolf spell, Valseid, Leyran Ravager deals 2 damage to any target that isn’t a blocking creature and you gain 2 life.
At the beginning of your end step, if Valseid didn’t attack this turn, transform it.
